element.name: Steinhardt's guide to the Eldritch Hunt

description.p: Steinhardt's Guide to the Eldritch Hunt is a 350+ pages Soulsborne inspired tome packed with exciting new content to enhance your 5E games.

Inspired by Lovecraftian Horror and the Soulsborne franchise, you'll discover a victorian setting crawling with nightmarish monsters, eldritch moons, and the ever-looming threat of madness, which fundamentally alter the world and how players interact with it.
